element_text:
{"chunk": "If an impairment loss subsequently reverses, the carrying amount of the asset is increased to the revised estimate of its
recoverable amount, but not in excess of the amount that would have been determined had no impairment been recognised for
the asset in prior years.
All impairment losses or reversals of impairment losses are recognised immediately in profit or loss.
Government grants
Grants are accounted for under the accruals model as permitted by FRS102.", "context": "This chunk discusses the company's policy on the impairment of assets and the accounting for government grants, which are relevant to the company's financial statements."}
